{{cpp/utility/basic_stacktrace/title|swap}}
{{cpp/utility/basic_stacktrace/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++23 |
void swap( basic_stacktrace&amp; other ) noexcept(/* see below */);
}}

Exchanges the contents of the container with those of {{tt|other}}. Does not invoke any move, copy, or swap operations on individual {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} objects.

{{cpp/container/note iterator invalidation|vector|swap}}

If {{c|std::allocator_traits&lt;allocator_type&gt;::propagate_on_container_swap::value}} is true, then the allocators are exchanged using an unqualified call to non-member {{tt|swap}}. Otherwise, they are not swapped (and if {{c|1=get_allocator() != other.get_allocator()}}, the behavior is undefined).

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | other | {{tt|basic_stacktrace}} to exchange the contents with}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===Exceptions===
{{noexcept|std::allocator_traits&lt;Allocator&gt;::propagate_on_container_swap::value
{{!!}} std::allocator_traits&lt;Allocator&gt;::is_always_equal::value}}

===Complexity===
Constant.
